com.harambe.game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.harambe.game.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Internal representation of the connect 4 grid as a 2d char array & logic

      • put

        public void put(int col,
                char symbol)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Puts a coin on the board and in the internal grid representation
        Parameters:
        col - Column to put into (leftmost being 0)
        symbol - Symbol of the Player
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - putting in not possible

      • remove

        public void remove(int col)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Removes a coin from the column on the internal grid representation
        Parameters:
        col - Column to remove from (leftmost being 0)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - already empty

      • isTerminalState

        public boolean isTerminalState()
        Checks whether the current board is in a final state (meaning a leaf node) This is true if board if full (draw) or someone wins
        Returns:
        boolean value

      • checkWin

        public boolean checkWin(char playerSymbol)
        checks for a win horizontally, vertically and diagonally
        Parameters:
        playerSymbol - Symbol to check for wins
        Returns:
        win or no win for player

      • getWinForUI

        public int[][] getWinForUI(char playerSymbol)
        Win location for the UI
        Parameters:
        playerSymbol - the playerSymbol (Board.PlayerX)
        Returns:
        2d array of 4-fields (4x 2 integers in form row, column)
